item.name: searchmerchant
item.param:
merchants\[\d+\]\.id, merchants\[\d+\]\.name, merchants\[\d+\]\.head, merchants\[\d+\]\.longitude, merchants\[\d+\]\.latitude, merchants\[\d+\]\.area\.name, merchants\[\d+\]\.code, merchants\[\d+\]\.businessAddress, merchants\[\d+\]\.businessTime, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantTelephone, merchants\[\d+\]\.category\.id, merchants\[\d+\]\.category\.name, merchants\[\d+\]\.info, merchants\[\d+\]\.favourPloy, merchants\[\d+\]\.memberGroup, merchants\[\d+\]\.memberGroup\.memberCount,
merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.commentCount, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.favCount, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.consumeCount, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.creditScore, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.averageGradeSrc, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.creditGrade\.value, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.creditGrade\.label, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.creditGrade\.htmlImg,
areas\[\d+\]\.area\.id, areas\[\d+\]\.area\.name, areas\[\d+\]\.merchantCount,
categories\[\d+\]\.category\.id, categories\[\d+\]\.category\.name, categories\[\d+\]\.merchantCount,
preferentialCount,
pagination\.begin, pagination\.count, pagination\.currentPage, pagination\.pageSize

item.name: webMerchant
item.param: success, merchant\.name, merchant\.longitude, merchant\.latitude, merchant\.businessAddress, merchant\.contactTelephone, merchant\.businessTime, merchant\.category, merchant\.category\.id, merchant\.category\.name, merchant\.info, merchant\.favourPloy, merchant\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.commentCount, merchant\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.favCount, merchant\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.averageGradeSrc, merchant\.memberGroup\.memberCount
